DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria For PCS : Received treatment histologically confirm prostate cancer Not currently undergo radiation therapy chemotherapy prostate cancer Currently reside identifiable spouse willing participate 60 year old enrollment Inclusion Criteria Spouses : Currently reside prostate cancer survivor Exclusion Criteria prostate cancer survivor Spouses : Current participation moderate/vigorous intensity resistance train 2 hour per week Cognitive difficulty preclude answer survey question , participate performance test , give informed consent Medical condition , movement neurological disorder , medication contraindicates participation resistance exercise Unwillingness randomize
